messages.id: Share these plans in a chat ✅🔜
messages.message: Share these plans in a chat ✅🔜
messages.translation: Partager ces plans dans un échange ✅🔜
👫 Définir le nombre maximum de participants

id: Got it.  Choose a Date for the event by clicking on the Calendar below and then clicking Continue.
messages.message: Got it.  Choose a Date for the event by clicking on the Calendar below and then clicking Continue.
messages.translation: Reçu.  Sélectionner la date de l'événement sur le calendrier ci-dessous puis sélectionner Suivant

messages.id: Could not parse the date you provided. Please send it in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
messages.message: Could not parse the date you provided. Please send it in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
messages.translation: Impossible de comprendre la date fournie. Merci de l'envoyer au format AAAA-MM-JJ.

id: Got it.  Choose a Time for the event by clicking on the times below and then clicking Continue.
messages.message: Got it.  Choose a Time for the event by clicking on the times below and then clicking Continue.
messages.translation: Reçu. Choisir l'heure de l'événement en sélectionnant l'heure ci-dessous puis sélectionner Suivant

messages.id: Could not parse the time you provided. Please send it in the format 22:03.
messages.message: Could not parse the time you provided. Please send it in the format 22:03.
messages.translation: Impossible de comprendre l'horaire fourni. Merci de l'envoyer au format 22:03.

id: Where does the event take place?  Specify the name or address as you might type into Google Maps.
messages.message: Where does the event take place?  Specify the name or address as you might type into Google Maps.
messages.translation: Où se déroule l'événement?  Enter le nom ou l'adresse tel qu'utilisé sur Google Maps

id: Specify any additional notes you'd like to show about the event.
messages.message: Specify any additional notes you'd like to show about the event.
messages.translation: Entrer toutes notes additionnelles que vous aimeriez ajouter à propos de l'événement.

id: If you don't have any notes, just click /skip.
messages.message: If you don't have any notes, just click /skip.
messages.translation: Si vous n'avez pas de notes, cliquez simplement sur /skip.
error à la création de l'évènement : {Err}

messages.id: Alright, I've created your event! You can now add additional content, or share it to another chat.
messages.message: Alright, I've created your event! You can now add additional content, or share it to another chat.
messages.translation: Très bien, j'ai créé l'évènement ! Vous pouvez maintenant y ajouter du contenu, ou le partager dans un autre échange.

messages.id: Specify the name of the event.
messages.message: Specify the name of the event.

messages.id: Specify the name of the person hosting the event.
messages.message: Specify the name of the person hosting the event.
messages.translation: Entrer le nom de l'hôte de l'événement

messages.id: Specify the date on which this event takes place:
messages.message: Specify the date on which this event takes place:

messages.id: Specify the time at which this event takes place:
messages.message: Specify the time at which this event takes place:
messages.translation: Entrer à quelle heure l'événement se tiendra:

messages.id:
Specify the maximum number of people that can attend.  Once the maximum is reached, users will no longer be able to click 'I'm Going'.

To disable, send a 0.
messages.message:
Specify the maximum number of people that can attend.  Once the maximum is reached, users will no longer be able to click 'I'm Going'.

To disable, send a 0.
messages.translation: Entrer le nombre maximum de participants.  Une fois le maximum atteint les utilisateurs ne pourrons plus sélectionner 'Participe'

messages.id: Choose the display language for this event.
messages.message: Choose the display language for this event.
messages.translation: Choisir la langue affichée pour cet événement

messages.id: Choose the time zone for this event.
messages.message: Choose the time zone for this event.
messages.translation: Choisir le fuseau horaire de cet évènement.
erreur à la mise à jour de l'évènement : {Err}

messages.id: The value you provided is not one of the choices.
messages.message: The value you provided is not one of the choices.
messages.translation: La valeur fournie ne correspond pas à un choix disponible.

messages.id: A list of your upcoming events
messages.message: A list of your upcoming events
messages.translation: Liste de vos événements à venir

messages.id: A list of all your events, old and new
messages.message: A list of all your events, old and new
messages.translation: Liste de tous vos événements, anciens et récents

messages.id: Alright, you've been marked as attending.
messages.message: Alright, you've been marked as attending.
messages.translation: Parfait, vous êtes marqués comme participant

messages.id: Alright, you've been marked as maybe.
messages.message: Alright, you've been marked as maybe.
messages.translation: Parfait, vous êtes marqués comme peut-être

messages.id: Sorry, this event is currently full!
messages.message: Sorry, this event is currently full!

messages.id: Alright, you've been marked as unable to attend.
messages.message: Alright, you've been marked as unable to attend.
messages.translation: Parfait, vous êtes marqués comme indisponible

messages.id: Event is ready to be used!
messages.message: Event is ready to be used!
messages.translation: L'événement est prêt a être utilisé

messages.id: Event is closed, please contact the host for more information.
messages.message: Event is closed, please contact the host for more information.
messages.translation: L'événement est fermé, veuillez contacter l'hôte pour plus d'informations.

messages.id: Can you go? Use the buttons below.
messages.message: Can you go? Use the buttons below.
messages.translation: Peux-tu venir?  Utilise les boutons ci-dessous.

messages.id: You're ✅ planning or 🤔️ considering attending the following events.  Click an event for more info.
messages.message: You're ✅ planning or 🤔️ considering attending the following events.  Click an event for more info.
messages.translation: Vous ✅ planifiez ou 🤔️ envisagez d'assister aux événements suivants. Cliquez sur l'événement pour plus d'informations.

messages.id: Not an event you are attending.
messages.message: Not an event you are attending.
messages.translation: Ce n'est pas un événement auquel vous assistez.

messages.id: Sorry, I wasn't able to find the event.  Try again.
messages.message: Sorry, I wasn't able to find the event.  Try again.
messages.translation: Désolé, je n'ai pas réussi à trouver l'événement. Essayer à nouveau.

messages.id: Sorry, but this event does not allow you to bring any guests.
messages.message: Sorry, but this event does not allow you to bring any guests.
messages.translation: Désolé, mais cet événement ne vous permet pas d'amener d'invités.

messages.id: Alright, tell me the name of the first guest you are bringing to {Name}. You can bring up to {MaxGuests}. Send me one name at a time, please!
messages.message: Alright, tell me the name of the first guest you are bringing to {Name}. You can bring up to {MaxGuests}. Send me one name at a time, please!

messages.id: Woah, slow down!  Just give me the name of the attendee.
messages.message: Woah, slow down!  Just give me the name of the attendee.
messages.translation: Waouh, ralentis ! Donnez-moi simplement le nom du participant.

messages.id: Got it.  Who's the next guest?  If that's the last one, click /done.
messages.message: Got it.  Who's the next guest?  If that's the last one, click /done.
messages.translation: J'ai compris. Qui est le prochain invité ? Si c'est le dernier, cliquez sur /done.

messages.id: You're all set! I've added those people as your guests at {Name}. You can now return to the chat you were in previously. Thanks for using the Furry Plans Bot!
messages.message: You're all set! I've added those people as your guests at {Name}. You can now return to the chat you were in previously. Thanks for using the Furry Plans Bot!
messages.translation: Vous êtes prêt! J'ai ajouté ces personnes comme invités sur {Name}. Vous pouvez maintenant revenir au chat dans lequel vous étiez précédemment. Merci d'utiliser le robot Furry Plans!

messages.id: Click here to specify Guest names...
messages.message: Click here to specify Guest names...
messages.translation: Cliquez ici pour spécifier les noms des invités...

messages.id: Click the button below to activate this event.
messages.message: Click the button below to activate this event.
messages.translation: Cliquer sur le bouton ci-dessous pour activer cet évènement.

messages.id: The language has been set to English.
messages.message: The language has been set to English.
messages.translation: La langue française a été sélectionnée

messages.id: In which time zone do you live? You can either send one of the time zones on this list, or you can send your current 📍 Location by clicking the paperclip and choosing Location.
messages.message: In which time zone do you live? You can either send one of the time zones on this list, or you can send your current 📍 Location by clicking the paperclip and choosing Location.
messages.translation: Dans quel fuseau horaire habitez-vous ? Vous pouvez soit envoyer l'un des fuseaux horaires sur cette liste, ou vous pouvez envoyer votre 📍 Emplacement actuel en cliquant sur le trombone et en choisissant Emplacement.

messages.id: Specified Time Zone not found.  Please choose a time zone from the list.  If the list is not appearing, please click the button that looks like four boxes in the text entry field to bring up the choices.
messages.message: Specified Time Zone not found.  Please choose a time zone from the list.  If the list is not appearing, please click the button that looks like four boxes in the text entry field to bring up the choices.
messages.translation: Fuseau horaire spécifié introuvable. Veuillez choisir un fuseau horaire dans la liste. Si la liste n'apparaît pas, veuillez cliquer sur le bouton qui ressemble à quatre cases dans le champ de saisie de texte pour faire apparaître les choix.

messages.id:
Before you continue, please read and accept our privacy policy.

https://telegra.ph/Furry-Plans-Bot-Privacy-Policy-06-29
messages.message:
Before you continue, please read and accept our privacy policy.

https://telegra.ph/Furry-Plans-Bot-Privacy-Policy-06-29
messages.translation:
Avant de continuer, veuillez lire et accepter notre politique de confidentialité.

https://telegra.ph/Furry-Plans-Bot-Privacy-Policy-06-29

messages.id: Please check the policy again to see how to finish.
messages.message: Please check the policy again to see how to finish.
messages.translation: SVP vérifier à nouveau la politique de confidentialité pour pouvoir terminer

messages.id: Thanks!  You're all set to start using the Furry Plans Bot!  Type /start to create a new set of plans.
messages.message: Thanks!  You're all set to start using the Furry Plans Bot!  Type /start to create a new set of plans.
messages.translation: Merci! Vous pouvez commencé d'utiliser Le planificateur de plans furry! Écrire /start pour commencer un nouveau plan.

messages.id: Create a new set of plans
messages.message: Create a new set of plans

messages.translation: Recevoir un flux de calendrier personalisé
En savoir plus sur le Bot

messages.id: See a list of all events you RSVPd to
messages.message: See a list of all events you RSVPd to
messages.translation: Voir une liste de tous les événements auxquels vous avez répondu

messages.id: Let's create some new plans.  First, send me the name of the event.
messages.message: Let's create some new plans.  First, send me the name of the event.
messages.translation: Commençons un nouveau plan.  Premièrement écrire le nom de l'événement

messages.id: Here is a list of available commands:
messages.message: Here is a list of available commands:
messages.translation: Voici la liste des commandes disponible

messages.id: The Furry Plans bot was created by 🐕‍🦺Av (www.avbrand.com) Translations provided by:
messages.message: The Furry Plans bot was created by 🐕‍🦺Av (www.avbrand.com) Translations provided by:
messages.translation: Le robot Furry Plans a été créé par 🐕‍🦺Av (www.avbrand.com) Traductions fournies par:

messages.id: This project is open source! Learn more at: https://github.com/avwuff/telegram-plans-bot
messages.message: This project is open source! Learn more at: https://github.com/avwuff/telegram-plans-bot
messages.translation: Ce projet est open source ! En savoir plus sur : https://github.com/avwuff/telegram-plans-bot

messages.id: I don't understand that command. Send /help for help.
messages.message: I don't understand that command. Send /help for help.
messages.translation: Je ne comprend pas cette commande. Écrire /help pour de l'aide

messages.id: The Furry Plans Bot provides an iCal feed of all events that you've marked as 'Yes' or 'Maybe'. You can add this feed to Google Calendar or other calendars, and events will appear automatically! To get the feed URL, chat with @furryplansbot and send the command /feed.
messages.message: The Furry Plans Bot provides an iCal feed of all events that you've marked as 'Yes' or 'Maybe'. You can add this feed to Google Calendar or other calendars, and events will appear automatically! To get the feed URL, chat with @furryplansbot and send the command /feed.
messages.translation: Le bot Furry Plans fournit un flux iCal de tous les événements que vous avez marqués comme "Oui" ou "Peut-être". Vous pouvez ajouter ce flux à Google Agenda ou à d'autres agendas, et les événements apparaîtront automatiquement ! Pour obtenir l'URL du flux, discutez avec @furryplansbot et envoyez la commande /feed.
